/usr/bin/c++    -Wall -Wextra -Wshadow -std=c++0x -march=native -Werror     -Wl,--export-dynamic CMakeFiles/heat.dir/src/main.cc.o CMakeFiles/heat.dir/src/HeatSolver.cc.o CMakeFiles/heat.dir/src/CGSolver.cc.o CMakeFiles/heat.dir/src/Array.cc.o CMakeFiles/heat.dir/src/Debug.cc.o  -o heat -rdynamic /software/opensuse/openmpi/1.6.5/lib64/libmpi_cxx.so /software/opensuse/openmpi/1.6.5/lib64/libmpi.so -ldl -lm -lrt -lnsl -lutil -lm -ldl -lrt -lnsl -lutil -Wl,-rpath,/software/opensuse/openmpi/1.6.5/lib64
